use_cases_desc: Courier dispatching in a control room for the courier freight management industry.
contribution_desc:
The paper evaluates interaction techniques for a multi-display setup for a courier dispatcher. The authors are particularly interested in how Natural User Interface (NUI) technology can support this type of work.
A setup is designed where multi-touch is compared to mouse, track-pad and leap motion. For the particular setup the multi-touch condition performed the best. For the experiment, a modified Fitts' pointing task is used.
